name: Large beetle
description: Chewing deep into The Tree are these somewhat magical beetles, enlarged as a byproduct of the druids' magic.

name: Leafling
description: The leaves falling from the crown have swept through enchanted winds, giving them life, letting them breathe.

name: Sleepless druid
description: Bound to reality, unable to even meditate, these sleepless monks pace with haunting thoughts, ready to practice their magic on any potential target.

name: Lost adventurer
description: Not all who try to climb The Tree succeed. This soul is lost, unable to distinguish their own kin from the enemies who wander alongside you.

name: Giant beetle
description: The beetles of all creatures seemed particularly attuned to the druid's magic. The larger ones were kept as pets, making their way as far up as The Tree's crown.

name: Sleeping druid
description: The barrier between waking and sleeping seems lost to these magicians of the mind who draw power from their deep sleep. This one someday hopes to achieve a blissful state of dreaming.

name: Golden Leafling
description: Many leaves cling to The Tree's crown, growing old in the magic wind. They learned to detach and reattach themselves at will so that they can walk alongside their creators.

name: Dreaming druid
description: These powerful creatures have lived decades in a deep sleep to the point of blissful dreaming, granting them access to a sacred well of ancestral strength.
